title: Heptagon Calculator – area, perimeter, side, apothem & circumradius

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Perimeter: \( P = 7s \) Apothem (inradius): \( a = \frac{s}{2 \tan(\pi/7)} \) Circumradius: \( R = \frac{s}{2 \sin(\pi/7)} \) Area (from side): \( A = \frac{7}{4} s^2 \cot(\pi/7) \) Interior angle: \( \theta = \frac{(7-2)\times 180^\circ}{7} = \frac{900^\circ}{7} \approx 128.571^\circ \)
